description: Associates a group (batch) of assets with an IoT SiteWise Monitor project.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The ID of the project to which to associate the assets.

parameters.name: assetIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the assets to be associated to the project. (string) ---

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Don't reuse this client token if a new idempotent request is required. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: A list of associated error information, if any.

nested_items.name: assetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset, in UUID format.
